title: Is there a place to report grammar errors in lore?
body:
I've found several grammar errors in the official lore for some champs, but when I try to post them here, the posts always get ignored and bumped down really fast. I like reading the champion lore, but it kinda annoys me that a company as big as Riot still has grammar errors in their official lore. Is there a place that I can reach a rioter about the errors I've found?
Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
I suspect the best place would be the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards - I think we add those to the bug database so they can be brought to the attention of the right teams.  

However, if it's in the older lores, then there's a chance that they'll be lower priority until they are updated.  If it's the newer lore, then definitely submit it.  I'm sure Jaredan will have conniptions if he hears about it too!  ;)

(I'm not on those teams, so I can't look into it directly for you.  The Report a Bug board does seem like the 'proper channels' though!)
Technically, they would be "grammatical errors" but I'll just sip tea.
u can report that but they will ignore this as they are ignoring wrong skills descriptions reported many times in Bug report board :P
